post.text: Departing San Antonio, Texas! THANK YOU! #Trump2016 #AmericaFirst

comment.author: Haley
comment.text: I am not sure if he is really wanting to do all he said or if he is drawing votes splitting the Conservative Republicans so Hillary can win. Just not sure

replies.author: Branden
replies.text: Be sure that's not the case.

replies.author: Haley
replies.text: So right. If it is true it will come out. I like his 2nd Amendment, military, and veterans care. Just have not made up my mind except I will not vote for Hillary. Other than that, just listening and waiting.
